meanings.definition: The act of spelling a word differently than its original form.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy creating respellings of common words for fun.
meanings.sent2: The respellings in the book confused me at first.
meanings.sent3: His respellings of names in the story made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The respellings in the text added a unique twist to the narrative.
meanings.sent5: Her creative respellings made the language more interesting to read.

meanings.definition: Words that have been spelled differently than their original form.
meanings.sent1: The teacher asked the students to identify the respellings in the paragraph.
meanings.sent2: The respellings on the sign were hard to understand.
meanings.sent3: The respellings in the poem gave it a modern touch.
meanings.sent4: The respellings in the document reflected the author's unique style.
meanings.sent5: The respellings in the book stood out and caught my attention.
